channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger is ready for a special day in 'Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch', then in 'Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone', the Museum has a brand-new exhibit - which goes missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Abuela win the Great Abuela Cook-off in 'The Great Abuela Cookoff', and in 'Missing Map', Dora finds Map after a game of Hide-and-Seek.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George learn some wonderful magic words. Nice things happen when you say please and thank you.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A new synthesiser arrives for Daddy Pig, and his family collect sounds for it from around the house while he is out at work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when Mr. Bull arrives to do some noisy work - he is building a windmill, to make electricity! The children join in and make their own windmills too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: For World Book Day, the playgroup must dress up as a character from their favourite book. But Peppa can't decide which as she has so many favourites.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny Thistle comes to visit and gives Daisy and Poppy a powerful magical wand. The children escape from the castle and. go bananas.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A bad haircut threatens to ruin more than just Steve's good looks in 'Bad Hair Day!', then in 'Kanga Ruiner!', the team travels to Australia to stop a giant Mecha-Roo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds in 'Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken', then in 'Pups Save a Pet Show', there's a pet show where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Alex's costume gets him carried off by seagulls in 'Pups Save Captain Crinkle Cut', then in 'Pups Save the Big Nightlight', Humdinger and Kitties take the lighthouse from Seal Island.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups squirrel-proof a post office in 'The Crew Builds A Post Office', then in 'The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash', Rubble & Crew transforms the car wash.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: After discovering an ice road that leads to a giant ice treasure, Blaze, AJ, Watts and Gabby go an adventure to find out what's inside.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa takes Goldie the Goldfish for a visit to the vets and is surprised when she finds that there's a new road to be built over the building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back.

channel.desc: Alex's costume gets him carried off by seagulls in 'Pups Save Captain Crinkle Cut', then in 'Pups Save the Big Nightlight', Humdinger and Kitties take the lighthouse from Seal Island.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork.

channel.desc: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.
